pages.text: $(item)Ceramic$() is a solid material praised for its extreme heat resistance.$(br2)This is a vital component to survive atmospheric re-entry in a $(l:0_basics/warp_armor)Space suits$() or $(l:5_combat/hull)ship$().

pages.title: Raw ceramic
pages.text: As sand & clay are readily available on most planets, making Raw ceramic should never be a problem...
